keyword: how many calories in a burger bun
title: How Many Calories in a Burger Bun?
meta_description: Discover how many calories in a burger bun, including carbs, protein, fat, and full nutrition breakdown per bun with quick tweaks and FAQs.
h1: How Many Calories in a Burger Bun?
assumptions: Standard white hamburger bun, plain, about 50 g, no seeds, butter, or toppings.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by brand, size, ingredients, and baking method. Check labels when available.

quick_answer.text: A standard burger bun contains about 120 kcal and 22 g carbs.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories in a burger bun?
faqs.a: About 120 kcal for a standard plain white burger bun.

faqs.q: What are the carbs in a burger bun?
faqs.a: Typically 22 g carbs, including 1 g fiber and 3 g sugars per bun.

faqs.q: Does a burger bun have protein or fat?
faqs.a: Around 4 g protein and 2 g fat per standard bun.

faqs.q: How does whole wheat change calories in a burger bun?
faqs.a: Whole wheat buns often have 10-20 fewer calories and more fiber.

faqs.q: Why is sodium high in burger buns?
faqs.a: Due to added salt in dough; about 200 mg per bun, varying by brand.
